artist: Artist: Victor Vasarely; Author: Foreword by Victor Vasarely; Publisher: Galerie der Spiegel, Cologne, Germany
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: grey softcover with light grey text on front and back covers and spine; images and text printed on transparent thin paper; introduction by the artist in German and French; images are geometric patterns made up of horizontal and vertical lines; two original signed serigraphs included, loose as issued (see .2 and .3); 40 pp.
image_copyright: © Victor Vasarely %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings: Numbered in ink on justificatin page: 351
medium: Screenprints and line-etchings after drawings on transparent paper, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
signed: Screenprints (2) signed in pencil, LR: Vasarely
title: Naissances
